Name: Brain surface fingerprints
Acknowledgements: We thank Julie Fiez, Melissa Libertus and Griffin Koch for their contributions to experimental design, and other assistance.
Funding: The analyzed data were collected with funding from the National Science Foundation (NSF 1734735), awarded to Melissa Libertus, Marc Coutanche and Julie Fiez

HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: 'Coutanche, M.N., Sauter, J., Akpan, E., Buckser, R., Vincent, A., Caulfield, M.K. (in press). Novel approaches to functional lateralization: Assessing information in activity patterns across hemispheres and more accurately identifying structural homologues. Neuropsychologia.
ReferencesAndLinks: Most of the underlying analysis code for this project can be found at https://github.com/jakesauter/lateralization_project
